member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.ProviderEngine.IntelIPP
member.summary: Intel IPP, place Intel IPP dlls under \NativeDLLs\intel64 for x64 platform and \NativeDLLs\ia32 for x86 platform before use Intel IPP as the provider engine

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics
member.summary: Statistical functions based on MathNet and Intel IPP, to use Intel IPP platform, please place intel IPP dll in the same folder of SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.dll. \NativeDLLs\ia32 for x86 platform and \NativeDLLs\intel64 for x64 platform.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.Maximum(System.Double[])
member.summary: Find the Maximum value from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.Minimum(System.Double[])
member.summary: Find the Minimum value from the double array(supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.Mean(System.Double[])
member.summary: Find the Mean value from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.RMS(System.Double[])
member.summary: Find the RMS value from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.StandardDeviation(System.Double[])
member.summary: FInd the standard deviation from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.Variance(System.Double[])
member.summary: Find the variance from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet, Intel IPP)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.Skewness(System.Double[])
member.summary: Find the skewness from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet)

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.Statistics.Statistics.Kurtosis(System.Double[])
member.summary: Find the Kurtosis from the double array (supported platforms: MathNet)
